docker.install:
# Install Claude Code CLI (as node user so it installs to /home/node/.local/bin)
RUN su - node -c 'curl -fsSL https://claude.ai/install.sh | bash' \
    && echo 'export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH"' >> /home/node/.zshrc

aider.name: Aider
aider.description: AI pair programming in your terminal

docker.install:
# Install Aider (requires Python)
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y python3 python3-pip && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
    && pip3 install --break-system-packages --no-cache-dir aider-chat

codex.name: OpenAI Codex CLI
codex.description: OpenAI's Codex CLI for code generation

docker.install:
# Install OpenAI Codex CLI
RUN npm install -g @openai/codex

gemini.name: Gemini CLI
gemini.description: Google's Gemini CLI for code assistance

docker.install:
# Install Google Gemini CLI
RUN npm install -g @google/gemini-cli

opencode.name: OpenCode
opencode.description: Open source AI coding agent for the terminal

docker.install:
# Install OpenCode (as node user)
RUN su - node -c 'curl -fsSL https://opencode.ai/install | bash' \
    && echo 'export PATH="$HOME/.opencode/bin:$PATH"' >> /home/node/.zshrc

# Install AMP CLI (as node user)
RUN su - node -c 'curl -fsSL https://ampcode.com/install.sh | bash' \
    && echo 'export PATH="$HOME/.amp/bin:$PATH"' >> /home/node/.zshrc
